TEXT.TITLE: STONE CONTAINER <STO> COMPLETES WAITING PERIOD
TEXT.BODY: Stone Container Corp said it and Southwest Forest Industries Inc <SWF> completed all waiting period requirements under the Hart-Scott-Rodino Anti-Trust Improvements Act of 1976. Stone said it will proceed with its previously proposed acquisition of Southwest. Reuter
